channel.title: Shoutbox help, just learned PHP/MySQL
channel.description:
[b]This is not an advertisement![/b]
Ok, so I'm adding a shoutbox to the homepage of this website: [url=http://www.froyoscape.site40.net]http://www.froyoscape.site40.net[/url] and everything works great, the MySQL, PHP and Databases, but when I test it out, it doesn't post the message. I'm sorta've hoping someone here can help me out with this problem.
-Sibor!
P.S I just learned PHP/MySQL so I'm not very good at finding out what the problem is :(

item.title: Shoutbox help, just learned PHP/MySQL
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

It’s ok guys, my good friend (php legend from xat) has helped me out.

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox help, just learned PHP/MySQL
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:7, topic:470340”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=587743.msg4170613#msg4170613 date=1354274348]

Post your code.

He only had a form,

What? If he only had a form why were there PHP errors. Think before you post.
[/quote]Wow… When i looked there were no errors, and he only had a form. Think before you post[/quote]

Sorry but that makes no damn sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox help, just learned PHP/MySQL
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:8, topic:470340”][quote author=KempiScape link=topic=587743.msg4170661#msg4170661 date=1354285679]

Post your code.

He only had a form,

What? If he only had a form why were there PHP errors. Think before you post.
[/quote]Wow… When i looked there were no errors, and he only had a form. Think before you post

Seriously, think before you post. there is no need to be a dick.

I wasn’t being a dick, I was merely stating that there were php errors on that, he’s obviously fixed it now. If you’re going to contradict someone and then be in the wrong it’s your place to think before you post.[/quote]

Neither of us were wrong, neither of us are wrong.

Read full topic
